ai.summary: A short, easy 2 km circular walk starting from Abbey Wood station in southeast London, taking you through green spaces around Lesnes Abbey Woods and along quiet, shaded paths suitable for beginners and families.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with well-maintained gravel and compact dirt paths. Some shaded woodland sections, a few boardwalk stretches, and occasional gentle slope segments near the woods.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked trails. Be mindful of cyclists on shared paths in the Lesnes area. Wear sturdy footwear and bring water. Check weather conditions; paths can be muddy after rain. Keep an eye on children near water features and ruins. Respect wildlife and nearby residents.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn when the weather is mild and wildlife is active.

seo.title: Abbey Wood Station to Lesnes Abbey Woods: Easy 2km London Hike
seo.meta_description: Explore a short, family-friendly 2km hike starting at Abbey Wood Station in London, winding through Lesnes Abbey Woods and nearby green spaces. Flat paths, woodland scenery, and easy terrain.
seo.h1: Abbey Wood Station to Lesnes Abbey Woods: Easy 2km Hike
